title: Peer-Supported Intensive Surgical Skills Workshop

context.additional_context: Conducting practical exercises through collaboration with peer learners using VR equipment and models in a simulation room. Accessing and evaluating learning materials via personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Independently apply the surgical safety checklist (WHO standards) with ≥80% accuracy.
Pass proficiency assessments after three practice sessions in suturing techniques (continuous/interrupted/vertical mattress).
Achieve ≥4.0/5.0 in simulation evaluations of pre-surgical preparation (scrubbing, gown/glove donning).
Achieve ≥90% accuracy in local anesthesia technique VR simulations.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
